casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. O’Neal, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. O’Neal (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 179.]

(No. 98-1735 Submitted January 11, 2000 Decided March 8, 2000.) *180Michael K. Allen, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and William E. Breyer, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. John J. Gideon, for appellant. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons set forth in its entry dated July 9,1998.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
